entry.def: When spoilage occurs, something, usually food, decays or is harmed, so that it is no longer fit to be used.

means.word_mean: 3. the act of spoiling something by causing damage to it;

auth_sentence.content: "In Florida, we saw tremendous geographic disparities in spoilage rates for ballots," Edley said.
